_header: Saint John in our gospel says us
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 2558.
_description: Gospel for the Fourth Sunday after Easter in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
In oure gospell saynte Johan saise vsþat till his dissiples
                    saide iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat he of vs haue no maistrieAnd bringe vs to þi
                    Ioye in hye . Amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion in vr gospel seiþ vsÞat to his disciples seide
                    Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Sey alle Amen wilfullyAnd schild vs alle from his baily
                    AMEN
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Vado ad eum qui me misit (f. 190va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLatMisB17.Last Lines:
…[ ] when we degh make no worthyTo come to blys thurgh þi
                    mercy
BodLatMisB17.Note:
Corresponds to Oxford,  Bodleian Library Ashmole 42 (SC 6923), fols.
                        124v-125v; imperfect at beginning because just
                    fragment, 10 x 2; worn and dirty, with loss of text.
BodLatMisB17.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  S. 
             “A Note on the Robartes MS of the Northern Homily Collection.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         67 (1966): 58-66.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
IN oure godspelle Seynt Ione telles vsÞat til his disciples
                    saide ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And when we dye make vs worthyTo come to blisse thorewe
                    þi mercy
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica iija post octava pasche secundum Iohannem (p.
                    198)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn in oure Gospel seyth vsþat to his disciplis seyde
                    ihesus…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…And þat it may so to vs besey we Amen pur
                    Charite
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Secumdum Iohannem Vado ad eum qui me misit & nemo ex vobis interogat
                        et c (f. 127)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Saynt iohn in oure gospell saise vsþat to his disciples sayd
                    ihesus…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Crauand crauand ouercommen am IGraunt it swa be for þi
                    mercy
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
þis es þe gospell of þe ferthe sononday efter paske
                    day… (f. 82v)

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Iohn in oure gospell says vsÞat to hys dysciplis sayde
                    Ihesus…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…& halde hym done & ger hym cryCrandon[?] cryand ouer
                    comen and I
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica tercia post octavas pasche Secundum Iohannem (f.
                        90v)
